subject: FROM THE DEPUTY GOVERNOR ,
body:
FROM THE DEPUTY GOVERNOR ,
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA (CBN)
ALHAJI SULEIMAN BARAU.
This is to inform you that your delivery man has arrived with your inheritance cash trunk box value  $8.3 million dollars in J.F.K international airport New York
USA. as their transit. I want you to know that you have 24 hours to call him now  with this line (253) 237-33 then ask to speak to the diplomatic deliveryman in person of Paul Martins  in the United States. Let us know if you are still interested to get your trunk box delivered to you today? As he has been waiting to hear from you to enable him get to your home address without missing his way.
For your information, the deliveryman with your package is not aware of the content of the trunk box for security purpose. Please do not tell him to avoid running away with your funds. On no account should you let him know about the content of the consignment to avoid evil intention. Most importantly you are advised to send your full data to him, which include (1)your Full Name, (2)Current Residential Address,(3) Direct Cell Number, and A copy of any identity card to verify that you are the right receiver to avoid mistakes, and bear in mind that you have to clear the trunks once the delivery man arrive the Airport.
Note that you must call me as soon as you receive this email for more discussion, Also reconfirm your full current address and valid phone number to the Delivery officer via his above email address once you receive this email to enable him deliver your cash consignment box to your house without any further delay or mistake. You are advised not to waste his time at the airport, so that he would not be stranded in any way because he will return if he finds out that you are not doing anything to get him over to your house.
CONGRATULATIONS.
ALHAJI SULEIMAN BARAU.
DEPUTY GOVERNOR FOREIGN OPERATIONS
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA

subject: Re:   FROM THE DEPUTY GOVERNOR ,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. Could you please clarify a few things for me? 

1. Who is the delivery man and why is he delivering a cash trunk box to me?
2. What is the purpose of this delivery? Is it related to any official business or transaction?
3. Can you provide more details about Paul Martins, the diplomatic person mentioned in your email?
4. How did you obtain my contact information and why was I chosen for this delivery?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Shanna

subject: ATTN:Shanna, urgent information's
body:
ATTN:Shanna,

I received your email and the contents are well noted.

Please it well interest you to know that this is inheritance fund which my
client has the

same first name with you SHANNA and he dead in plane crash last years ago
keeping his fund

under me without any next of kin that is why i have chosen you as his next
of kin and

ready to transfer the fund to you either bank to bank transfer or
diplomatic delivery to

your doorstep which is more easier to me On an agreement, I assure you that
I am going to

get this fund to you since you have the same first name with my late client.

You will assure me of keeping my dealings with you to an utmost secrecy
because of my

position in my bank as the deputy governor.

You will promise to give me 20% of the total fund as soon as the fund gets
to you with a

written promissory note signed by you.

I want to re-emphasis to you that this fund is still with my bank and under
my control.

Now with my whole heart I want to enter into real business with you on a
sincere agreement

that you are going to part with me and my own share of the fund is
guaranteed.

The delivery man is Paul Martins , he is delivery to you because i made you
the next of

kin to my late client .

Paul Martins is the diplomatic person and he only deliver consignment to
the owner and

that is all , i obtained your contact from the Nigeria Chambers of commerce
.

I know you are going to be honest to me that is why I have chosen you.

Reconfirm to me once again to avoid mistakes in the cost of the transaction.

Your full Name;

Your Address;

Your Age;

married status;

occupation;

position.

Tel;

More  importantly, reconfirm this to me so that all we go as planned, my
word is my bond .

Urgent response, no time to waste on this .

Yours faithfully,

DR. Kingsley Obiora.

Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria



Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have
provided. Could

you please clarify a few things for me?

1. Who is the delivery man and why is he delivering a cash trunk box to me?
2. What is the purpose of this delivery? Is it related to any official
business or

transaction?
3. Can you provide more details about Paul Martins, the diplomatic person
mentioned in

your email?
4. How did you obtain my contact information and why was I chosen for this
delivery?

I look forward to your response.
Best wishes,
Shanna

subject: Re: ATTN:Shanna, urgent information's
body:
Hello DR. Kingsley Obiora,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. Could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. Who is the delivery man, Paul Martins, and why is he delivering a cash trunk box to me? Is there any specific reason or purpose behind this delivery?

2. Can you provide more details about Paul Martins? What is his role in this transaction and how can I trust him as a diplomatic person?

3. How did you obtain my contact information? Why was I chosen for this delivery?

I would appreciate it if you could provide more information on these points so that I can better understand the situation. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Shanna

subject: Urgent informations
body:
Attn: Shanna ,

I received your email and the contents are well noted.

Paul Martin's is only a diplomat he delivered consignment to the owners ,
he does not know the content of the consignment it was declared to him as
family special effect gold and diamond to avoid raise of eyebrow on this
fund only me and you know that the content of the consignment is money $10m
USD in the boxes, the reason is I have chosen to do this transaction with
you and have my own share of the money .

You don't have any business with Paul Martin's only to hand over to you and
he we start coming back

I have told you I got your contact from Nigeria Chambers of commerce

Yours faithfully,

DR. Kingsley Obiora.

Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria

subject: Re: FROM THE DEPUTY GOVERNOR ,
body:
Hello DR. Kingsley Obiora,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate you sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the contents of the diplomat package and the precautions taken to avoid suspicion.

I'm curious, why did you choose me specifically to be involved in this? Is there something about me or my background that made you think I would be a good person to trust with such a task?

Also, could you please provide more details about how this process will work? How will the money be transferred and what steps do we need to take to ensure everything goes smoothly?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Shanna

subject: ATTN:Shanna,
body:
ATTN:Shanna,

I received your email and the contents are well noted.

Sorry for getting back to you very late because of work load and compelling
all our beneficiaries up to date is not easy for me hee but I am trying my
best to make sure everything goes well .

Why i choose you is because i can trust you my ind told me that you are a
very good person , note that this process we work since am still the deputy
governor central bank of nigeria is my job and i know what to do to make
sure you have this fund without any wasting time and have my own share
given to me after you have this fund in your position.



Yours faithfully,

DR. Kingsley Obiora.

Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria

subject: Find Attached Copy
body:
ATTN:Shanna,

Find attached copy and fill it sign return back .

Also reconfirm your deyails so that you name we for all the proper
documentations.


Yours faithfully,

DR. Kingsley Obiora.

Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria

body:
